Texts.Chs: 我已经获得了终极的物质枪技术，并将其与我的遗传密码绑定在一起。 我可以轻松地挖掘几乎任何东西。
Texts.Eng: I have obtained the ultimate in Manipulator tech and bound it to my genetic code. I can mine nearly anything with the greatest of ease.

Texts.Chs: 始源物质枪现在是我的了。但是，如果想要完全使用它，我首先需要^orange;在纳米加工器处把它修好^reset;。
Texts.Eng: The Master Manipulator is now mine. It seems that if I am to fully be able to use it, however, I'll first need to ^orange;repair it at a nanofabricator^reset;
